fanOscillationMode.label: fan oscillation mode
fanOscillationMode.description: The current mode of oscillation; an enum of fixed, vertical, horizontal, direct, indirect, fixedCenter, fixedLeft, fixedRight, far,  all

all.description: The fan is set to oscillate in all directions
all.label: all

far.description: The fan is set to move air at a distance
far.label: far

fixed.description: The fan is fixed in one direction and not oscillating
fixed.label: fixed

fixedCenter.description: The fan is fixed to the center and not oscillating
fixedCenter.label: fixed center

fixedLeft.description: The fan is fixed to the left and not oscillating
fixedLeft.label: fixed left

fixedRight.description: The fan is fixed to the right and not oscillating
fixedRight.label: fixed right

vertical.description: The fan is set to oscillate vertically
vertical.label: vertical

horizontal.description: The fan is set to oscillate horizontally
horizontal.label: horizontal

direct.description: The fan is set to oscillate in the direction of people
direct.label: direct

indirect.description: The fan is set to oscillate while avoiding people
indirect.label: indirect

supportedFanOscillationModes.label: supported oscillating fan modes
supportedFanOscillationModes.description: Supported states for this oscillating fan to be in
